alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 1:26PM AKST until March 06 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST SUNDAY NORTH OF GAKONA... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches, with localized amounts up to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph Saturday night from Isabel Pass to Paxson. * WHERE...Copper River Basin north of Gakona. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 9 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to slippery roads and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall will begin this morning and accumulation rates will gradually increase during the day near Paxson and Chistochina north. Snow will peak in intensity during the late afternoon. Winds will increase as snow begins to taper off after midnight Saturday into Sunday, which could cause areas of reduced visibility due to blowing snow, especially through Isabel Pass. If you must travel, plan extra time and carry an emergency kit.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
